genresAdvancedInfo.name: puglia indie
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Puglia indie is a genre of music that originated in the southern Italian region of Puglia. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the tamburello (a type of drum), accordion, and guitar, as well as electronic elements. The lyrics often address themes such as love, identity, and social issues. Some of the most well-known Puglia indie artists include Canzoniere Grecanico Salent

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
